mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM notice where noticeState = '1'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (noticeNum, adminId, noticeTitle, noticeContent, noticePic, noticeFile, noticeRegdate, noticeReadCount, noticeState) VALUES(noticeNum_seq.nextval, 'admin', #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticePic, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noticeFile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, 0, '1')
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT rownum as rm, c.* FROM(SELECT b.* FROM(SELECT a.* FROM(SELECT * FROM notice ORDER BY noticeNum DESC )a
where a.noticeState = '1'
where a.noticeState = '2'
)b
AND b.noticeTitle LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND b.noticeContent LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND (b.noticeContent LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' OR b.noticeTitle LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%')
)c )d
